name: Five Nights At Trollface
description:
Welcome to Meme Land, a good place for food and memes. However, your job is surviving a night from 12 am, until 6 am. Ready for the game of Trollface & company?

Thanks to Scott Cawthon for the Fnaf Saga. This is a Fnaf Fangame made with a Scratch mod.

Five Nights At Trollface© ElQuiqueScratcher
